name: Inferno Staff
description: A staff infused with the power of fire, capable of unleashing devastating flames.
looks: The Inferno Staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate carvings that resemble flames. At the top of the staff, there is a crystal orb that radiates a fiery glow.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Increases damage and effectiveness of fire magic spells.

special_effects.fire_attunement: Grants resistance to fire damage while wielding the staff.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made of silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a slender and elegant blade with a shiny silver finish. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings and a pommel in the shape of a lion's head.

special_weapon_skills.swordmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordmanship skill when used.

name: Bronze Dagger
description: A small and sharp dagger made from bronze.
looks: The bronze dagger has a short, double-edged blade with a sharp point. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around the tang. It is lightweight and easy to maneuver.

special_weapon_skils.dagger: Provides a bonus to Dagger skill when equipped.

name: Steel Sword
description: A well-crafted sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single-edge and a crossguard. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when wielded.

name: Battle Axe
description: A large and heavy axe designed for heavy combat.
looks: The battle axe has a long handle made of sturdy wood, with a large and sharp metal blade attached at the end. The blade has a curved shape for maximum cutting power.

special_weapon_skills.axe_mastery: Grants a bonus to Axe Mastery skill when wielded.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Dagger
description: A small and sharp dagger, perfect for close-quarters combat.
looks: The dagger has a slim and curved blade, with a hilt made of polished wood. It fits comfortably in the hand and is easy to conceal.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a pointed tip. The hilt is made of solid steel with a crossguard for hand protection.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword suitable for beginners.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The handle is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the Fireball spell, which creates a fiery explosion at the target location.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and is sealed with a red wax seal. It has the words 'Fireball' written in elegant script on the front.

special_effects.area_of_effect: The Fireball spell damages all enemies within a certain radius of the target location.

name: Golden Staff
description: A staff made of solid gold, adorned with intricate designs and gemstones.
looks: The Golden Staff is a long, elegant staff made entirely of gold. It has a curved top that is encrusted with various gemstones, including sapphires, emeralds, and diamonds. The staff is engraved with intricate patterns and symbols, giving it a regal and magical appearance.

special_weapon_skills.staff_mastery: Increases damage and accuracy with staves.
special_weapon_skills.lightning_bolt: Unleashes a powerful lightning bolt spell.

special_effects.enchantment: The Golden Staff is enchanted to enhance the wielder's magical abilities.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A classic longsword made from durable steel.
looks: The steel longsword has a straight double-edged blade with a fuller running down the center. The hilt is wrapped in leather and has a crossguard for protection.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Allows the use of advanced sword techniques.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy and durable chestplate made from strong steel.
looks: The steel chestplate is a solid piece of armor that provides excellent protection to the torso. It is made from polished steel plates that are riveted together. It has adjustable leather straps and buckles for a secure fit.

name: Longsword
description: A versatile one-handed sword, suitable for both slashing and thrusting attacks.
looks: The longsword has a double-edged blade with a straight crossguard and a grip wrapped in leather for a firm hold.
